query:
ALTER TABLE user_profiles 
ADD COLUMN current_company VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN current_title VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN work_authorization VARCHAR(100),
ADD COLUMN how_did_you_hear VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN available_start_date VARCHAR(100),
ADD COLUMN willing_to_relocate INT DEFAULT 0;
